page.title: 02SPORT,WITHERNSEA
page.content: The area is reasonably well catered for,although in no sport does a team operate at other than a local level.A most popular sport is Soccer with 4 Saturday and 2 Sunday teams.There is a Rugby Union club with its own ground and facilities, operating 2 teams, and a Rugby League club running 1 team but without any home facilities.The Tennis Club has its own pavillion and 4 courts,2 grass and 2 hard,whilst there is also a Golf Club with a 9 hole course and a club house often used by the local community for social events.The area also has a Bowling Club,a Badminton Club,which uses facilities at the secondary school,and an Archery Club.There is an outdoor swimming pool run by the council and open during the summer months.There are 2 snooker halls and 4 darts leagues
